content.query:
-- Be sure to run this from the inspection_lake database!
USE inspection_lake

SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM Inspections i
    INNER JOIN Restaurants r
        ON i.HSISID = r.HSISID
WHERE
    r.NAME LIKE N'%Chicken%';
GO

-- Dame's Chicken and Waffles
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM Inspections i
WHERE
    i.HSISID = 4092017451
ORDER BY
    InspectionDate ASC;
GO

-- Percentiles for Dame's Chicken and Waffles
SELECT TOP(1)
	i.RestaurantName,
    COUNT(*) OVER () AS NumberOfRecords,
    PERCENTILE_CONT (0.0)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Min,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.25)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS LowerQuartile,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.5)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Median,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.75)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS UpperQuartile,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.95)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Percentile95,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.99)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Percentile99,
    PERCENTILE_CONT (1.0)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Max
FROM Inspections i
WHERE
    i.HSISID = 4092017451;
GO

-- Percentiles for all McDonald's locations
SELECT TOP(1)
    COUNT(*) OVER () AS NumberOfRecords,
    PERCENTILE_CONT (0.0)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Min,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.25)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS LowerQuartile,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.5)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Median,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.75)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS UpperQuartile,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.95)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Percentile95,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.99)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Percentile99,
    PERCENTILE_CONT (1.0)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Max
FROM Inspections i
WHERE
    i.RestaurantName LIKE N'%McDonalds%' OR i.RestaurantName LIKE N'%McDonald''s%';
GO

-- Percentiles for all restaurants
SELECT TOP(1)
    COUNT(*) OVER () AS NumberOfRecords,
    PERCENTILE_CONT (0.0)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Min,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.25)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS LowerQuartile,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.5)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Median,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.75)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS UpperQuartile,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.95)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Percentile95,
	PERCENTILE_CONT (0.99)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Percentile99,
    PERCENTILE_CONT (1.0)
		WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY Score ASC) OVER () AS Max
FROM Inspections i
WHERE
    -- Some restaurants don't have scores because they weren't graded.
    Score > 0;
GO
